# description

**Instance Property**

A textual representation of this Skeleton.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Inspecting hand skeletons

- **allJoints**: All of the joints in a hand skeleton.
- **neutralPose**: A hand pose that you can use as a reference.
